Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Oak Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
